  • pydra.core.messaging.serializers

Source code for pydra.core.messaging.serializers

import sys
import struct
import json
import pickle
import numpy as np



[docs]def serialize_int(i: int):
    return int(i).to_bytes(4, sys.byteorder, signed=True)




[docs]def deserialize_int(i_bytes: bytes):
    return int.from_bytes(i_bytes, sys.byteorder, signed=True)




[docs]def serialize_string(s: str):
    return s.encode("utf-8")




[docs]def deserialize_string(s_bytes: bytes):
    return s_bytes.decode("utf-8")




[docs]def serialize_float(f: float):
    return bytearray(struct.pack("d", f))




[docs]def deserialize_float(f_bytes: bytes):
    return struct.unpack("d", f_bytes)[0]




[docs]def serialize_dict(d: dict):
    return json.dumps(d).encode("utf-8")




[docs]def deserialize_dict(d_bytes: bytes):
    return json.loads(d_bytes.decode("utf-8"))




[docs]def serialize_array(a: np.ndarray):
    return a.dumps()




[docs]def deserialize_array(a_bytes: bytes):
    return pickle.loads(a_bytes)
